lyra:dialog_stage_0.content: Heard about Wrynn missing her book, such a shame.

lyra:dialog_stage_1.content: Oh really? You must be something special.

lyra:dialog_stage_2.content: That sounded sarcastic, but it only kind of was, anyway I'll be seeing ya'

lyra:dialog2_stage_1.content: What are you doing in my house? Did you break in? That may just be unforgivable, you can't violate the safety of a home.

lyra:dialog2_stage_2.content: Right, right. I see, this is not gonna work, the lying. Tell me what you took.

lyra:dialog2_stage_3.content: Oh great! Straight to the point, at least you didn't lie to me... I guess...

lyra:dialog2_stage_4.content: It's a spell book. It only has a few spells within it but it comes in handy sometimes.

lyra:dialog2_stage_5.content: You're trying to leave this place right? Probably not a good idea to break in since I know somebody who could get you off the island.

lyra:dialog2_stage_6.content: I'll make you a deal. I'm not in good standing with the people of Mycelia.

lyra:dialog2_stage_7.content: You go there, make friends, be nice and retrieve something for me I'll put in a good word for you.

lyra:dialog2_stage_8.content: It won't be easy, you'll have to ask around, you come back to me with it I'll get you off this place.

lyra:dialog2_stage_9.content: Take the spell book off the counter, open it and you'll find the spell, cast it and you'll be there before you can blink..

lyra:dialog2_stage_10.content: Go on now before I change my mind.

lyra:dialog2_stage_1_1.content: I can't say I blame you, it is a pretty nice ring, but it does something special the others don't.
